thread.title: WWE News: Roman Reigns & Paul Heyman Attend Bloomberg Power Players NY, Superstars and Legends Reunite With the Intercontinental Title
thread.title_full: WWE News: Roman Reigns & Paul Heyman Attend Bloomberg Power Players NY, Superstars and Legends Reunite With the Intercontinental Title

author: Jeffrey Harris
title: WWE News: Roman Reigns & Paul Heyman Attend Bloomberg Power Players NY, Superstars and Legends Reunite With the Intercontinental Title
text:
[wrestling](/wrestling/) /
[News](/wrestling/category/News/)
WWE News: Roman Reigns & Paul Heyman Attend Bloomberg Power Players NY, Superstars and Legends Reunite With the Intercontinental Title
– Roman Reigns and Paul Heyman took the stage today at the
Bloomberg Power Players New York: Afternoon Session. They were panelists for the WWE Takes Over the World panel. Here are the details:
Bloomberg Power Players New York: Afternoon Session
1:45 PM EDT – WWE Takes Over the World
Behold the Tribal Chief and the Wiseman. Two of the biggest names in sports entertainment tell us how the WWE is taking the show to a global audience, while staying number one back home in the US.
Paul Heyman, WWE Hall of Famer; The Legendary “Wiseman” to Roman Reigns
Roman Reigns, WWE’s No. 1 Box Office Attraction; Perennial WrestleMania Main Eventer
Moderator: Kim Bhasin, Celebrities & Athletes Reporter, Bloomberg
Moderator: Scarlet Fu, Anchor, Bloomberg Quicktake
– WWE released a new video showcasing Shawn Michaels, The Miz, Wade Barrett, and Kofi Kingston reuniting with the Intercontinental Title:
